Author: SetsuaD
Name: CeeLoPlugin
Punchline: Track player participation and dice rolls in FFXIV with dynamic tie-breakers and bet confirmations.
Description: CeeLoPlugin is an FFXIV plugin that streamlines Ceelo gameplay by tracking player participation, dice rolls, and bets. With features like dynamic update support, automated bet confirmations, and tie-breaker buttons, it enhances your gaming experience.
Changelog: v1.1: Added dynamic update support, tie-breaker buttons (Multi-Tie and Two-Player Tie), bet confirmation checkbox, improved UI, enhanced announcements, and refined roll order logic.
